name: FRUITWOLF WEBGL
description:
Fruitwolf

Arrow keys/WASD to move
Hold/Release C to pick up & throw

- Play as fruitwolf
- Grow an army of fruitfellas
- Make your way home to eat your supper

Game by
Mark Foster (@ClawhammerMark)
David Fenn (@autotwitch)
Angus Dick (@angusdick)

Made for Ludum Dare 34 - Theme: Growing
